markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Kabriri (Him Who Gnaws)](/Deities.aspx?ID=76)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 72, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Kabriri, Him Who Gnaws, is the demon lord of ghouls, graves, and secrets kept by the dead. According to legend, Kabriri is the reborn form of the first humanoid to devour his kin in life. His realm, Everglut, is connected to graveyards throughout the multiverse by a snarled network of tunnels that bring knowledge and sacrifices to the demon lord. Kabriri appears as a hulking ghoul with elven ears, teeth filed to points, an unnaturally long tongue, ashen skin, and cloven hooves. He is worshipped primarily by ghouls, ghasts, and lacedons.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Eat the flesh of your own kind

**Anathema** Reveal secrets of the dead to nonbelievers, despoil grave markers

**Area of Concern**
ghouls, graves, and secrets kept by the dead

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Favored Weapon** [jaws](/Weapons.aspx?ID=1) or [Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=19)

**Domains** [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=16), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Undeath](/Domains.aspx?ID=34), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=55)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Decay](/Domains.aspx?ID=42), [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=46)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=167)

- **2nd**
[Expeditious Excavation](/Spells.aspx?ID=574)

- **3rd**
[Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213)

</column>
name: Kabriri (Him Who Gnaws)
